label: About Us
tagline: Quality-Checked Fashion Jewellery from the Heart of Andhra Pradesh
mission: To make beautiful, quality-assured fashion jewellery accessible to everyone — whether you visit our Chirala store or shop online.
storyTitle: Rooted in Chirala, Built on Trust
storyShort: Bhagyalakshmi Future Gold brings you quality-checked fashion jewellery. Based in Chirala, we personally inspect every piece before it reaches you.
storyLong: For years, customers in Chirala and across Bapatla district have trusted us for quality fashion jewellery. Now, we're bringing that same trust and quality to you online — so you can shop our curated collection from anywhere.
qualityProcess: Every piece of jewellery passes through our hands before it reaches yours. We personally quality-check each item for finish, durability, and design accuracy.
warranty: We provide warranty on specific items. Ask us about warranty coverage when you purchase — in-store or online.

faq.q1: Where is Bhagyalakshmi Future Gold located?
faq.a1: Bhagyalakshmi Future Gold is located opposite SBI Bank on the right, Chirala, Bapatla District, Andhra Pradesh 523155. You can find us easily on Google Maps.
faq.q2: What types of jewellery are available at Bhagyalakshmi Future Gold?
faq.a2: We offer a wide range of fashion jewellery including necklaces, earrings, bangles, bracelets, rings, jewellery sets, dance & traditional ornaments, and leg & hair accessories. We carry gold plated, panchaloha, antique, nakshi, CZ, and uncut stone jewellery.
faq.q3: Do you offer jewellery on rent for weddings?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer complete marriage rental sets for weddings. You can rent bridal jewellery sets at affordable prices with a refundable deposit. Visit our store or browse our rental collection online.
faq.a4: We are open Monday to Saturday from 10:00 AM to 9:00 PM, and on Sundays from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM.
faq.a5: Yes, every piece of jewellery passes through our hands before it reaches yours. We personally quality-check each item for finish, durability, and design accuracy. We also provide warranty on specific items.
